text: Theisen light sometimes in life you do
something wrong and you have to know how
to apologize for what you did now it's
really useful to know because everybody
makes mistakes and if you want to be a
good person
then you should learn how to say that
you're sorry so here's how we do this in
English so what do you say to apologize
to someone well it depends on what
mistake you made if it's a small mistake
something minor like maybe you bumped
into somebody or you stepped on their
toe or you interrupted them when they
were talking you can just say something
very casual very simple like oh sorry
about that
or pardon me or sorry something really
quick really easy so the other person
will probably appreciate your apology
and they will respond with something
like no problem no worries or don't
worry about it like this yeah yeah
anyway so oh I'm sorry for interrupting
you I'm sorry about that don't worry
about it
or like this hey I'm sorry I stepped on
your toe my bad sorry about that don't
worry about it mom or like this
oh sorry about that I'm sorry my fault
it's all right forget about it Oh
sometimes you make a bigger mistake you
do something worse when that happens you
need to give a more meaningful apology
like maybe you woke up very late this
morning and you missed an important
meeting at work or maybe you were
playing football and you got angry and
you pushed another player okay so when
these things happen we say something
like hey I'm very sorry that I hit your
car while I was driving and I want to
take the time to apologize to you for
that now I hope you'll forgive okay I
understand thanks for apologizing
oh so in these cases you need to explain
what you did and explain that you're
sorry for it and then give the other
person a chance to forgive you which
feels good when they forgive you and it
should be something like this hi boss
yes I'm very sorry I didn't finish my
report on time I apologize for the
inconvenience and I want you to know
that it won't happen again
oh now something else that is a very
important part of an apology is to offer
to make it up to them offer to do
something for them to show that you are
really sorry make things even like this
hey I'm really sorry I ate your pizza
that was rude but I want to make it up
to you how about I buy you a new really
hey pizza sounds great thank you very
much I appreciate it
[Music]
like this Hey
I'm very sorry I had to cancel our date

but I really want to make it up to you
so how about I take you out tomorrow

thank you for your apology I appreciate
